functionDecorators.name: collateralBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Get the borrowing rate for a collateral type. borrowing rate is specified for a 1 sec interval and accurancy is in RAY.

functionDecorators.name: collateralConfigs
functionDecorators.description: Retreives the entire config for a specific config id.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: the ID of the conifg to be returned.

functionDecorators.name: collateralDebtLimit
functionDecorators.description: Get the debt limit for a collateral type. this is a platform wide limit for new debt issuance against a specific collateral type.

functionDecorators.name: collateralLiquidationBonus
functionDecorators.description: Get the liquidation bonus for a collateral type. this rate is applied as a one time fee for new borrowing and is specified in WAD.

functionDecorators.name: collateralLiquidationFee
functionDecorators.description: Get the liquidation fee for a collateral type. this rate is applied as a one time fee for new borrowing and is specified in WAD.

functionDecorators.name: collateralLiquidationRatio
functionDecorators.description: Get the liquidation ratio that needs to be maintained for a collateral type to avoid liquidation.

functionDecorators.name: collateralMinCollateralRatio
functionDecorators.description: Get the minimum collateralization ratio for a collateral type for new borrowing or collateral withdrawal.

functionDecorators.name: collateralOriginationFee
functionDecorators.description: Get the origiation fee for a collateral type. this rate is applied as a one time fee for new borrowing and is specified in WAD.

functionDecorators.name: maxVotingPeriod
functionDecorators.description: The max duration of voting on a proposal, in seconds.

functionDecorators.name: minVotingPeriod
functionDecorators.description: The minimum duration of voting on a proposal, in seconds.

functionDecorators.name: proposalThreshold
functionDecorators.description: The percentage of votes required in order for a voter to become a proposer.

functionDecorators.name: removeCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Remove the config for a collateral type.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Sets the borrowing rate for a collateral type. borrowing rate is specified for a 1 sec interval and accurancy is in RAY.

parameterDecorators.name: _borrowRate
parameterDecorators.description: the new borrowing rate for a 1 sec interval.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralConfig
functionDecorators.description: Creates or overwrites an existing config for a collateral type.

parameterDecorators.name: _debtLimit
parameterDecorators.description: the debt ceiling for the collateral type.

parameterDecorators.name: _liquidationRatio
parameterDecorators.description: the minimum ratio to maintain to avoid liquidation.

parameterDecorators.name: _minCollateralRatio
parameterDecorators.description: the minimum ratio to maintain to borrow new money or withdraw collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: _borrowRate
parameterDecorators.description: the borrowing rate specified in 1 second interval in RAY accuracy.

parameterDecorators.name: _originationFee
parameterDecorators.description: an optional origination fee for newly created debt. Can be 0.

parameterDecorators.name: _liquidationBonus
parameterDecorators.description: the liquidation bonus to be paid to liquidators.

parameterDecorators.name: _liquidationFee
parameterDecorators.description: an optional fee for liquidation debt. Can be 0.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralDebtLimit
functionDecorators.description: Sets the debt limit for a collateral type.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralLiquidationBonus
functionDecorators.description: Sets the liquidation bonus for a collateral type. the liquidation bonus is specified in WAD.

parameterDecorators.name: _liquidationBonus
parameterDecorators.description: the liquidation bonus to be paid to liquidators.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralLiquidationFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets the liquidation fee for a collateral type. this rate is applied as a fee for liquidation and is specified in WAD.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralLiquidationRatio
functionDecorators.description: Sets the minimum liquidation ratio for a collateral type. this is the liquidation treshold under which a vault is considered open for liquidation.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralMinCollateralRatio
functionDecorators.description: Sets the minimum ratio for a collateral type for new borrowing or collateral withdrawal.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralOriginationFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets the origiation fee for a collateral type. this rate is applied as a one time fee for new borrowing and is specified in WAD.

functionDecorators.name: setMaxVotingPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Set the max voting period for a gov proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxVotingPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: the max voting period for a gov proposal.

functionDecorators.name: setMinVotingPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Set the min voting period for a gov proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: _minVotingPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: the min voting period for a gov proposal.

functionDecorators.name: setProposalThreshold
functionDecorators.description: Set the proposal threshold for a gov proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: _proposalThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: the proposal threshold for a gov proposal.

functionDecorators.name: setVotingQuorum
functionDecorators.description: Set the voting quora for a gov proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: _votingQuorum
parameterDecorators.description: the voting quora for a gov proposal.

functionDecorators.name: votingQuorum
functionDecorators.description: The percentage of votes in support of a proposal required in order for a quorum to be reached and for a proposal to succeed.
